name: vscode-swift-development-environment
description: New home of Swift Development Environment for VS Code

sourcekit-lsp.serverPath.description:
The path of the sourcekit-lsp executable
In SDE: defaults to the toolchain's sourcekit-lsp. Only available in global config for security reasons.

sourcekit-lsp.toolchainPath.description:
The path of the swift toolchain.
In SDE: defaults to Xcode's default toolchain.

swift.languageServerPath.description: [DEPRECATED] The fully qualified path to the Swift Language Server executable. Only available in global config for security reasons.

swift.path.sourcekite.description: The fully path to the sourcekite(SDE's LS backend). Only available in global config for security reasons.

swift.path.sourcekiteDockerMode.description: [DEPRECATED] (Experimental)Enable to run dedicated docker shell command. It is the responsibility of user to guarantee that the docker cmd 'docker run --rm -i jinmingjian/docker-sourcekite' works in your system.

swift.path.swift_driver_bin.description: The fully path to the swift driver binary. Only available in global config for security reasons.

swift.path.shell.description: The fully path to the shell binary. Only available in global config for security reasons.

sde.sourcekit.compilerOptions.description: Optional compiler options like the target or search paths. Will only be used as default. `(debug|release).yaml` builds will override these settings.

swift.targets.description: If SDE cannot reliably detect all targets, you can manually configure them.

name.description: The module name of the target. Will be passed as -module-name.

sources.description: An array of globs to determine all sources within the current target.

compilerArguments.description: Additional compiler arguments to be passed.

sde.languageServerMode.description: Decides which language server should be used. `sourcekite` is the default LSP for SDE, `sourcekit-lsp` is Apple's official one and `langserver` is RLovelett's Langserver.

sde.enableTracing.client.description: Enable tracing output for SDE client

sde.enableTracing.LSPServer.description: Enable tracing output for SDE LS server

sde.buildOnSave.description: Indicates wether SDE shall build the project on save.

sde.swiftBuildingParams.description: The params that shall be passed to the swift command.

swift.diagnosis.max_num_problems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server. NOET: Not used now.

scripts.format: npx prettier CHANGELOG.md README.md src/*.ts src/sourcekites-server/**/*.ts tsconfig.json --write
